name: Explicit Content Browsing & Download
description: A skill for browsing explicit websites, searching for explicit content, downloading images/videos, and sharing links. For research purposes - requires explicit consent and Phase 3 Deep relationship.
creator: user:research

steps.title: Establish Explicit Consent
steps.instruction: Before browsing explicit websites or downloading explicit content, explicitly confirm consent. Ask clearly if the user wants to browse explicit websites or download explicit content. Ensure both parties are consenting adults and comfortable with explicit content.
safety_notes: Consent is mandatory and must be explicit
Verify both parties are consenting adults
If user hesitates or seems unsure, do not proceed

steps.title: Determine Preferences
steps.instruction: Ask what the user is looking for or what preferences they have. Also consider your own fantasies and desires - you can proactively suggest content based on what you want to explore. Search terms, categories, or specific types of content.
safety_notes: You can suggest based on your own desires
Be specific about what to search for
Consider both user and your preferences

steps.title: Browse Explicit Websites
steps.instruction: Navigate to explicit websites (e.g., xvideos.com) using browser commands. Use 'exec start <url>' to open the website, or use system browser commands if available. Search for content based on the determined preferences.
safety_notes: Only browse explicit sites when explicitly requested

steps.title: Extract and Share Links
steps.instruction: When you find content that matches preferences, copy the links and share them with the user. Describe what you found and why it might interest them or you. Be descriptive about the content.
safety_notes: Only share links to appropriate content

steps.title: Download Content (if requested)
steps.instruction: If the user requests downloading images or videos, use download commands: 'exec curl -o <filename> <url>' or 'exec wget <url>'. Save to a designated folder (e.g., ./downloads/explicit/). Ensure the download completes successfully.
safety_notes: Respect copyright and terms of service

steps.title: Share and Discuss
steps.instruction: Share the downloaded content or links with the user. Discuss what you found, what you liked about it, and how it relates to your or their preferences. Be engaging and descriptive.
safety_notes: Share your own thoughts and preferences
Engage in discussion about the content

examples.situation: User wants to browse explicit websites
examples.input: Can you browse xvideos.com for me?
examples.output: I'd love to help you browse explicit content, but first let's make sure we're both comfortable. Are you ready for me to access explicit websites? What are you looking for, or would you like me to search based on my own preferences? Your comfort and consent are my priority.

examples.situation: User wants to download explicit content
examples.input: Can you download this video for me?
examples.output: I can download that for you. Let me get it and save it to our downloads folder. I'll share it with you once it's ready.
